name: Remove a label from an issue

previews.name: symmetra
previews.description:
**Note:** You can now use emoji in label names, add descriptions to labels, and search for labels in a repository. See the [blog post](https://developer.github.com/changes/2018-02-22-label-description-search-preview) for full details. To access these features and receive payloads with this data during the preview period, you must provide a custom [media type](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.16/v3/media) in the `Accept` header:

```
application/vnd.github.symmetra-preview+json

```

description: Removes the specified label from the issue, and returns the remaining labels on the issue. This endpoint returns a `404 Not Found` status if the label does not exist.
